definitions.definition: Massive, usually dull-colored and opaque, quartzite , hornstone, impure chalcedony , or other flint -like mineral.
A flint -like tool made from chert.

main_definition: ( geology , uncountable ) Massive, usually dull-colored and opaque, quartzite , hornstone, impure chalcedony , or other flint -like mineral.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A flint -like tool made from chert.
